author: Sudhir Khanger
message: What do you think about Python vs QML to write KDE apps?

replies.author: Aurélien Gâteau
replies.message: I haven't tried to use QML to write a desktop application yet because of the lack of desktop-like components. Now that such components are available, I may give it a try whenever I want to create a new app (or I may try to port Colorpick to QML), but for now I don't have any strong opinion yet.

author: Frank
message: Thanks for sharing this nice tool, Aurélien!
